name: Tim 7: Lance Un S.O.S
storyline: In order to be able to write and then send a message to the sea, Tim 7 must re-learn how to write and conjugate without fail...
summary:
Tim 7: Lance Un S.O.S is an edutainment game focusing on 6e level of French.

The contents of the subject are:
Agreements: the plural of nouns; agreement of adjectives, verb and past participle.

Conjugations: the present and its pitfalls; future, imperfect and simple past; the past perfect and the past perfect; the main irregular verbs.

Frequent confusions: conjugated verb or common noun; infinitive in “er” or past participle in “é”; or/where; and/is ; his/are; a/to; upper or lower case.

Write the key sounds: the sounds [o], [f], [k] and the sounds written with the letters x, y and z.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.
